headline: Cantor Maintains PriceTarget on BMY, Eyes Alzheimer’s Trial as Key Catalyst
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) ranks among the top stocks for an early retirement portfolio. On June 12, Cantor Fitzgerald maintained its price target of $55 and its rating of Neutral for Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY). The company’s Cobenfy’s ADEPT-2 top-line data in Alzheimer’s Disease Psychosis is anticipated in 2025, possibly as early as the second […]

headline: Will New Drugs Enable BMY to Offset the Impact of Generic Competition?
summary: BMY depends on Reblozyl, Opdualag and Breyanzi to offset revenue hits from generics and Medicare Part D impacts.

headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks to Maximize Your Retirement Income
summary: The traditional ways to plan for your retirement may mean income can no longer cover expenses post-employment. But what if there was another option that could provide a steady, reliable source of income in your nest egg years?
